alert.note: Alert for Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 4:42AM EDT until May 01 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek At Gilboa Bridge. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EDT Monday the stage was 16.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 17.1 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.6 feet on 04/14/1994. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Gilboa Bridge Flood Stage: 17.0 Observed Stage at Mon 4 am: 16.8 Forecast: Mon 8 am 17.1 Mon 2 pm 16.9 Mon 8 pm 16.0 Tue 2 am 15.1 Tue 8 am 14.7 Tue 2 pm 14.3 Tue 8 pm 14.0 Wed 2 am 13.8 Wed 8 am 13.6 Wed 2 pm 13.4 Wed 8 pm 13.3 &&
